cast.overview: The simple story has the pair coming to the rescue of peace-loving Mormons when land-hungry Major Harriman sends his bullies to harass them into giving up their fertile valley. Trinity and Bambino manage to save the Mormons and send the bad guys packing with slapstick humor instead of excessive violence, saving the day.
cast.title: They Call Me Trinity

details.biography: Gisela Hahn, born Gisela Drenkhan in Briesen (West Prussia), is a German actress. Due to her parents' fate as refugees, she came to Hamburg at the age of two and grew up in Visselhövede. In 1963 she went to Munich. There she became a doctor's assistant in order to finance her private acting and singing lessons. Shortly afterwards, in 1964, she made her first theater appearances under the stage name "Gisela Hahn".
details.name: Gisela Hahn
